verification.SUBJECT: KIVOO | Verify your account
verification.PREHEADER: Verify your Kivoo account! It will only take one click.
verification.BODY: Thank you for joining Kivoo. To complete your registration, please verify your email address.
verification.ALT_LINK: If you cannot click the button, copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.FOOTER: If you did not create this account, you can safely ignore this email.

password_reset.SUBJECT: KIVOO | Verification Code
password_reset.PREHEADER: Your verification code to reset your Kivoo password.
password_reset.IF_NOT_REQUESTED: If you didn't request this change, you can safely ignore this email.
password_reset.INSTRUCTION: Enter this code in the app to continue
password_reset.INFO_ONCE: You can only use this code once
password_reset.INFO_IGNORE: If you didn't request this change, ignore this email
password_reset.INFO_SHARE: Do not share this code with anyone
password_reset.SECURITY_ALERT_BODY: If you did not request this code, someone else might be trying to access your account. We recommend changing your password immediately.
password_reset.FOOTER_SAFE: If you didn't request this change, your account is still secure.

welcome_email.SUBJECT: KIVOO | Account successfully verified
welcome_email.PREHEADER: Your account has been successfully verified! You can now start using Kivoo.
welcome_email.WELCOME_MESSAGE: You can now start using Kivoo!
